name: Post Read Limited by Specified Category
author: Johnlei

sections.description:
Limit posts that users read by specify a category and a number!Users in specified roles access posts in specified category have the number limit.

Support

Contact me with QQ 44450448 or email me 44450448@qq.com
sections.installation:
Adding Post read limited by specified category to your WordPress site is really easy, follow these steps :

  • Install and activate the this Plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  • After installation, click the ‘PostReadLimit’ item under Settings menu in the left toolbar.
  • select limited category and fill in limited number, hit save button.
  • Done!
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

Add user role option, limit post read count to specified user group.

1.1.0

The plugin has been optimized 6 times.

1.0

  • Welcome our very first version of the plugin!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Adding Post read limited by specified category to your WordPress site is really easy, follow these steps :

  • Install and activate the this Plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  • After installation, click the ‘PostReadLimit’ item under Settings menu in the left toolbar.
  • select limited category and fill in limited number, hit save button.
  • Done!
